response.overview: An ancient terror rises from the Monster Manual: the Mind Flayer, a dark creature able to dominate minds and devour the dreams of every sentient being. Between epic atmospheres and playful pop incursions, an audacious bard and a band of unlikely heroes face its psionic horror in a whirlwind of battles, illusions, and surreal comedy. A journey between myth and parody that turns the multiverseâ€™s most feared monster into the protagonist of a story as unsettling as it is irresistible.
response.title: monster manual
